column1: Porsche - Update hidden section and dfd text
column27:
Hello team,



Could you please Update hidden section and dfd text.

1. Updat dfd text
Ich bestätige, dass ich mit der obigen Erklärung einverstanden bin
to
Ich bestätige hiermit, dass ich die im Rahmen dieser Reisekostenabrechnung geltend gemachten Beträge sowie die Aufwendungen für berufliche Auswärtstätigkeiten mit einem Firmenfahrzeug nicht als Werbungskosten im Rahmen der Einkommensteuererklärung geltend gemacht habe bzw. geltend machen werde. Ich bestätige ferner die Einhaltung der Reisekostenordnung und dass alle angegebenen Spesen geschäftlich begründet sind.


{code:java}
            <dataFieldDescriptor code="Declaration of consent" mandatory="true" type="Text" elementLinkType="net.ifao.vegas.domain.expense.StringLink" elementLinkRole="expense.declarationOfConsent">
                <assignTo>
                    <assign type="${CLASS_ExpenseStatement}" displayOrder="12">
                        <gui>
                            <dataFieldGUI guiType="CHECK_BOX" tab="ExpenseStatement.genData" />
                        </gui>
                    </assign>
                </assignTo>
                <nameTranslation>
                    <name locale="de_DE">Ich bestätige hiermit, dass ich die im Rahmen dieser Reisekostenabrechnung geltend gemachten Beträge sowie die Aufwendungen für berufliche Auswärtstätigkeiten mit einem Firmenfahrzeug nicht als Werbungskosten im Rahmen der Einkommensteuererklärung geltend gemacht habe bzw. geltend machen werde. Ich bestätige ferner die Einhaltung der Reisekostenordnung und dass alle angegebenen Spesen geschäftlich begründet sind.</name>
                    <name locale="en_US">I hereby confirm that I have not claimed or will not claim the amounts claimed in the context of this travel expense report and the expenses for professional external activities with a company car as income-related expenses in my income tax return. Furthermore, I confirm that the travel expenses regulations have been observed and that all expenses stated are business related.</name>
                </nameTranslation>
                <descriptionTranslation>
                    <name locale="de_DE"Ich bestätige hiermit, dass ich die im Rahmen dieser Reisekostenabrechnung geltend gemachten Beträge sowie die Aufwendungen für berufliche Auswärtstätigkeiten mit einem Firmenfahrzeug nicht als Werbungskosten im Rahmen der Einkommensteuererklärung geltend gemacht habe bzw. geltend machen werde. Ich bestätige ferner die Einhaltung der Reisekostenordnung und dass alle angegebenen Spesen geschäftlich begründet sind.</name>
                    <name locale="en_US">I hereby confirm that I have not claimed or will not claim the amounts claimed in the context of this travel expense report and the expenses for professional external activities with a company car as income-related expenses in my income tax return. Furthermore, I confirm that the travel expenses regulations have been observed and that all expenses stated are business related.</name>
                </descriptionTranslation>
                <roles>
                    <canEdit name="ExpenseStatementOwner" />
                    <canEdit name="ExpenseArranger" />
                    <canEdit name="ExpenseApproverRestricted" />
                    <canEdit name="ExpenseApproverFinal" />
                    <canEdit name="ExpenseAuditor" />
                    <canEdit name="ExpenseAccountant" />
                    <canEdit name="ExportProcess" />
                    <canEdit name="ExpenseManager" />
                    <canEdit name="ExpenseAdministrator" />
                </roles>
            </dataFieldDescriptor> {code}
 

 

2.Updat dfd text
License plate (XXX-XX1234[E,H])
to
License plate (XXX-XX1234)
{code:java}
            <dataFieldDescriptor code="licensePlateAbsence" mandatory="false" type="Text" elementLinkType="net.ifao.vegas.domain.expense.StringLink" elementLinkRole="expense.absence.licensePlate">
                <assignTo>
                    <assign type="${CLASS_Absence}" displayOrder="3">
                        <gui>
                            <dataFieldGUI guiType="FREE_TEXT" tab="Absence.vehicleUsage" />
                        </gui>
                        <validation>
                            <regEx expression="[A-ZÄÖÜ]{1,3}-[A-ZÄÖÜ]{1,2}[1-9]{1}[0-9]{0,3}$" />
                        </validation>
                    </assign>
                </assignTo>
                <nameTranslation>
                    <name locale="de_DE">KFZ-Kennzeichen (XXX-XX1234)</name>
                    <name locale="en_US">License plate (XXX-XX1234)</name>
                </nameTranslation>
                <descriptionTranslation>
                    <name locale="de_DE">KFZ-Kennzeichen (XXX-XX1234)</name>
                    <name locale="en_US">License plate (XXX-XX1234)</name>
                </descriptionTranslation>
                <roles>
                    <canEdit name="ExpenseStatementOwner" />
                    <canEdit name="ExpenseArranger" />
                    <canEdit name="ExpenseApproverRestricted" />
                    <canEdit name="ExpenseApproverFinal" />
                    <canEdit name="ExpenseAuditor" />
                    <canEdit name="ExpenseAccountant" />
                    <canEdit name="ExportProcess" />
                    <canEdit name="ExpenseManager" />
                    <canEdit name="ExpenseAdministrator" />
                </roles>
            </dataFieldDescriptor> {code}

3.Hidden section
Paid by Company toggle
Has a receipt toggle


{code:java}
      <dataFieldDescriptor code="HiddenSections" type="List">
        <assignTo>
          <assign type="${CLASS_SystemConfiguration}" />
        </assignTo>
        <nameTranslation>
          <name locale="en_US">Default hidden sections for Expense Statement page</name>
          <name locale="de_DE">Default hidden sections for Expense Statement page</name>
        </nameTranslation>
        <values>
          <item value="expenseStatement.summary.advance" />
          <item value="expenseStatement.absences.accommodation.paidByCompany" />
          <item value="expenseStatement.absences.accommodation.hasReceipt" />
         </values>
      </dataFieldDescriptor> {code}

Best regards,
Yutaka

column1: ProcurX EverC - Add FDFs and receipts
column27:
System: ProcuRX-EverC

Hello team,

Please, the customer wants the following changes:

*FDFs*
 * Budget number should not be mandatory
 * If travel for different department must be renamed as Department
 * Add a new FDF at {*}receipt level for all the receipts{*}:
 ** Name of FDF: Budget number
 ** Type: Free text
 ** Mandatory: no
 ** Visible: all the users
 ** Editable: owner, arranger and Auditor (as usual)

*Receipts*
 * Please, add the new receipts:

|*Laundry*|expense.basereceipt.receipt.laundry| |
|*Conference*|expense.basereceipt.receipt.conference| |
|*MLG*|expense.basereceipt.receipt.mlg| |
|*Shipment*|expense.basereceipt.receipt.shipment| |
|*Team activity*|expense.basereceipt.receipt.team.activity| |
|*Parking*|expense.basereceipt.receipt.parking| |
|*Visa/Passport*|expense.basereceipt.receipt.visa| |
|*Office expense*|expense.basereceipt.receipt.office.supplies| |

Team activity should be like business entertainment
 * Rename "Accommodation" receipt. The new name is: Lodging

I will do the EMS configuration for the receipts.

Thank you!

Alejandro
column198:
Server: Bali ; mega
System: ProcuRX-EverC
column257:
01/Aug/23 1:43 PM;alejandro.ruizrobles;Hello [~mkuchciak] ,

The ticket works as expected but the customer did the following changes in the last minute:
 * Budget Number FDF at the header of the statement needs to be mandatory (we need to revert the change)
 * "If travel for different department" FDF should come back to the configuration (we need to revert the change)
 * We need to add a new FDF:
 ** Name of FDF: Report Type
 ** Type: List
 ** Values: Travel report / Local report
 ** Mandatory: no
 ** Visible: all the users
 ** Editable: owner, arranger and Auditor (as usual)
 ** At the header of the statement
 * Budget number FDF for receipts needs a regrex expresion. It needs to be a maximum of 20 numbers/signs (like the FDF at the header of the statement)
 * Add a new receipt:
 ** Insurance (expense.basereceipt.receipt.insurance)

Thank you and my apologies for this :(

Alejandro;;;

column1: Porsche - Adjust fdf on statement level
column27:
Hello team,

Could you please adjust the fdf on statement level.

1. display attachment filed 
remove summary.attachments on hidden section
{code:java}
      <dataFieldDescriptor code="HiddenSections" type="List">
        <assignTo>
          <assign type="${CLASS_SystemConfiguration}" />
        </assignTo>
        <nameTranslation>

Tätigkeitsstätte, Abteilung, P-Nummer, Buchungskreis, Stammkostenstelle

Tätigkeitsland? (Auswahl mit %) to Tätigkeitsland?

1. display attachment filed 
remove summary.attachments on hidden section
{code:java}
      <dataFieldDescriptor code="HiddenSections" type="List">
        <assignTo>

        </assignTo>
        <nameTranslation>

        </nameTranslation>

        </values>
      </dataFieldDescriptor> {code}
2.  remove role of user, arranger, approver on these fileds.
Tätigkeitsstätte, Abteilung, P-Nummer, Buchungskreis, Stammkostenstelle

Tätigkeitsland? (Auswahl mit %) to Tätigkeitsland?

      <dataFieldDescriptor code="Tätigkeitsland" tmsCode="BorderCrossing" mandatory="true" type="LargeList" elementLinkType="net.ifao.vegas.domain.expense.StringLink" elementLinkRole="expense.countryOfOperation">

          <name locale="en_US">Country of operation?</name>

column1: Amadeus: new per diems for PT
column27:
Dear Codebusters,

I hope you do well!

Could I kindly ask you to update per diems for Portugal? 

There is a domestic region Portugal, and localization Lisbon (both must be updated to 30 EUR) and an International region (which also must be updated to 60EUR).

Also, please be aware that International per diems are correctly wrongly setup as it counted 20 EUR instead of 35:

!image-2023-06-30-13-45-41-341.png!

This should be done in 3 steps:

1) implement changes in BALI,

2) implement changes in STAGING,

3) after the client's confirmation implement changes in PRODUCTION.

 

I remain open to any questions.

 

Kind regards,

Milosz
column198:
AMADEUS-C:ama-es-Amadeus
PT - Amadeus Soluciones Tecnologicas S.A. - PT, LISBOA
column257:
05/Jul/23 10:22 AM;mmaciejczyk;Hello [~jtkacz],

Thank you for your patience!

I come back with confirmation - the calculation logic should be deleted - it means if the user travels in Portugal, he should always receive full per diems (30 euro) and if he travels outside Portugal, he should receive always full per diems (60 euro).

Right now, the logic that reduces per diems is not necessary and should be deleted.

!image-2023-07-05-10-21-15-562.png!

In that example, with new logic, the user for the trip to Spain should receive 35 EUR per diems - not reduced 24,5 EUR

Hope it clarifies.

Best regards,

Milosz;;;

06/Jul/23 6:15 PM;mmaciejczyk;Dear [~jtkacz],

You can proceed to STAGING.

Kind regards,

Milosz;;;

24/Jul/23 2:29 PM;mmaciejczyk;Dear [~jtkacz],

unfortunately the changes must be reverted. Customer does not agree with new interface -> right now, deductions or per diems are correctly setup - but the problem is with appearing in report:

This is how it looks now (wrong):

!image-2023-07-24-14-26-42-066.png!

And this is how it should look like: 

!image-2023-07-24-14-26-55-813.png!

#14297873 (old expense which is correct): 

it that case, for all deductions it says "0" but in allowances it substracts meals (so the total value = per diems - deductions).

I deeply apologize again.

Kind regards,

Milosz;;;

column1: Numiga - Create numiga-master template for FR
column27:
System: numiga-master-fr ; numiga-master-fr-test

Hello team,

We need to create a numiga master template based on the current ERS. I need your support for the VEGAS part. EMS configuration will be done by me.

*Receipts (available and default VAT in ERS)*
|*VEGAS code*|*Receipt (EN)*|*Receipt (FR)*|*Business entertainment*|
|ticket.flight|Flight|Vol| |
|fee|Credit card fee|Frais de carte bancaire| |
|hotel|Hotel|Hôtel| |
|other|Other expenses|Autres frais| |
|*NEW*|Other flight expenses and/or luggage expenses|Autres frais liés au vol ou aux bagages| |
|ticket.mainline|Train|Train| |
|car.rental|Rental car|Voiture de location| |
|entertainment|Entertainment expenses|Frais de divertissement|Yes|
|numiga.subsistance|Subsistence costs|Frais de séjour| |
|numiga.conference|Conference fees|Frais de conférence| |
|numiga.entrance|Entrance|Entrée| |
|numiga.ticket.ferry|Ferry|Ferry| |
|ticket.local|Public transport|Transports public| |
|numiga.material.office|Office materials|Matériel de bureau| |
|car.parking|Parking fee|Frais de stationnement| |
|numiga.car.fuel|Petrol / Fuel|Essence/carburant| |
|numiga.telephone|Telephone|Téléphone| |
|numiga.postage|Postage|Frais de courrier | |
|*NEW*|Gifts|Cadeaux| |
|car.taxi|Taxi|Taxi| |
|numiga.car.toll|Toll|Péage| |
|entertainment.employees|Entertainment expenses with employees|Frais de divertissment avec les employés|Yes|
|numiga.bahncard|Rail card|Carte ferroviaire| |
|numiga.banking.fee|Bank fee|Frais bancaires| |
|numiga.subsistance.breakfast|Breakfast (foreign)|Petit-déjeuner (étranger)| |
|numiga.servicecharge|Fee (Numiga)|Frais (Numiga)| |
|numiga.fee|Fee (travel agency)|Frais (Travel Agency)| |
|numiga.hotel.breakfast|Hotel breakfast|Petit-déjeuner à l'hôtel| |
|numiga.rent|Rent|Louer| |
|numiga.car.rental.fuel|Rental car fuel|Carburant de voiture de location| |
|numiga.car.rental.accident|Rental car accident|Accident de voiture de location| |
|numiga.car.rental.insurance|Rental car insurance|Assurance voiture de location| |
|numiga.parking.own|Parking own car|Parking voiture privé| |
|numiga.cleaning|Cleaning Expenses|Frais de nettoyage| |
|numiga.fee.participant|Participation fee|Frais de participation| |
|numiga.visa|Visa costs|Frais de visa| |
|numiga.advancePayment|Advance payment|Paiements avancés| |

All the receipts are available in numiga-master-test (staging) or numiga-master (BALI) so we only need to copy/paste and change the translations and add two new receipts.

*Tax rates*

They are in the ERS.

*Itinerary section*

It will be done by me using the EMS

*Free Data Fields*

Please, ping me for this topic because the main ones should be as numiga-master + we need to add the FR DFD for the mileage
|FDF Name - 1st language|FDF Name - 2nd language|FDF type|Values if FDF type = List - 1st language|Values if FDF type = List - 2nd language|Mandatory|Source|Position in UI|Selected receipts only (please specify)|Roles ("Edit" includes "See"|Where should the FDF be visible?|TMS Code (filled by Amadeus)|
|Traveller|Arranger|Approver|Auditor|Accountant|Administrator|UI|PDF report|Export file|
|Trip number|Numero de voyage|Text| | |No|Booking|Expense Statement| |Edit|Edit|See|Edit|See|See|Visible|Visible|Visible| |
|Cost Center|Centre de Coût|Text| | |Yes|Booking or profile (depending on where the info is present)|Expense Statement| |Edit|Edit|See|Edit|See|See|Visible|Visible|Visible|Cost_Center|
|Employee Number|Numero d'employé|Text| | |Yes|Booking or profile (depending on where the info is present)|Expense Statement| |Edit|Edit|See|Edit|See|See|Visible|Visible|Visible|Employee_Number|
|Department|Departement|Text| | |No|Booking or profile (depending on where the info is present)|Expense Statement| |Edit|Edit|See|Edit|See|See|Visible|Not visible|Visible|Department|
|Ordre de mission|Order Number|Text| | |No|Booking or profile (depending on where the info is present)|Expense Statement| |Edit|Edit|See|Edit|See|See|Visible|Not visible|Visible|Order_Number|
|Numero de projet|Project Number|Text| | |No|Booking or profile (depending on where the info is present)|Expense Statement| |Edit|Edit|See|Edit|See|See|Visible|Not visible|Visible|Project_Number|
|Employee group|Groupe d'employé|Text| | |No|Booking or profile (depending on where the info is present)|Expense Statement| |See|See|See|Edit|See|See|Visible|Not visible|Visible|Employee_Group|
|Trip purpose|Motif du déplacement|Text| | |Yes|Booking|Expense Statement| |Edit|Edit|See|Edit|See|See|Visible|Not visible|Visible|Trip purpose|
|Base Mileage|Kilométrage de base|Text| | |No|User profile|Expense Statement| |Sehen + Suchen|Sehen + Suchen|Sehen + Suchen|Sehen + Suchen|Sehen + Suchen|Sehen + Suchen|Visible|Not visible|Visible|Base Mileage|
|Already submitted mileage|Kilométrage déjà soumis|Text| | |No| |Daily allowance level|Mileage section|See|See|See|See|See|See|Visible|Not visible|Visible| |
|Total nights spent|Nombre de nuits|Text| | |No| |Receipt type level|Hotel / Hotel breakfast|Edit|Edit|See|Edit|See|See|Visible|Not visible|Visible| |

For the following topics, copy and paste from numiga-master:

Thank you!

Alejandro

column1: VW-CSO: please adapt per diem deduction for 3 month rule
column27:
Dear colleagues, 

with https://jira.ifao.net/browse/CI-8555 (vw-cso: activate 3 month rule) the automatic recognition of the 3-M rule was implemented for the system +With the following configuration:+
 - the first three months tax-free
 - and after the expiry of the tax-free three months taxable should be paid to the employee, for the same business trip location. Wage type: Employee = non-self-employed work according to § 19 Income Tax Act

*{color:#ff0000}Now the customer is asking for a modification for the meal deduction when the 3-M rule applies{color}*
 # {color:#172b4d}first on Bali{color}
 # {color:#172b4d}then on test location on prod:
!image-2023-06-15-19-52-19-715.png!{color}
 # {color:#172b4d}then on production{color}

*{color:#ff0000}Current situation:{color}* 

the breakfast that is paid by company with the hotel bill is not deducted from the (taxable) per diems when the 3-M rule applies:

!image-2023-06-15-19-43-08-234.png|width=531,height=590!

 

 

*{color:#ff0000}Should be:{color}*

column258:
05/Jul/23 8:14 PM;askarja;Hello [~ahrycenko],

I found the following:

_"If the employer pays higher reimbursements (e.g. voluntarily higher lump sums or more than three months), this constitutes {color:#FF0000}taxable wages{color}."_

That means in my opinion:
The company can voluntarily pay the per Diems longer that 3 month (and if the user is receiving meals in this time, they can be also deducted).
+But:+ 
if the user receives the per diems longer than 3 month, they are taxable income.

As far as I know, this customer is not the only one who has a configuration like that...?

Cheers, Annette

column1: ProcuRX-EverC - New Expense configuration
column27:
System: ProcuRX-EverC

Hello team,

Please, add the following information in the system:

*1.- Receipts* (just English, no other language applies)
|*Flights*|expense.basereceipt.receipt.ticket.flight | |
|{*}Accommodation{{*}}|expense.basereceipt.receipt.hotel| |
|*Per Diem*|expense.basereceipt.receipt.per.diem| |
|*Rental car*|expense.basereceipt.receipt.car.rental| |
|*Transportation*|expense.basereceipt.receipt.transportation| |
|*Communication*|expense.basereceipt.receipt.comm.other| |
|*Entertainment Other*|expense.basereceipt.receipt.entertainement.other| |
|*Flight expenses*|expense.basereceipt.receipt.ticket.flight.other| |

*Entertainment Other -* This receipt has business entertainment behavior

Default tax rate for Israel for all the receipts: none

Default tax rate for any country for all the receipts: none

*2.-Hide sections*

Please, hide the following features in the itinerary section (meal deductions, accommodation and mileage).

Please, hide cash advance.

*3.-Free Data Fields*

EN: trip purpose
 * Type of FDF: list
 * tms code: trip purpose
 * Mandatory: yes
 * The information comes: from booking and fixed list
 * Can edit: owner, arranger and auditor
 * Can see: approver, accountant and administrator
 * Appears: top of the statement (at the header)

EN: budget number
 * From 1 to 10 characters (digits and signs only)
 * Type of FDF: free text
 * Tms code: BUDGET ITEM (numbers only)
 * Mandatory: yes
 * The information comes: from booking
 * Can edit: owner, arranger and auditor
 * Can see: approver, accountant and administrator
 * Appears: top of the statement (at the header)

EN: If travel for different department
 * Type of FDF: list with drop down menu
 ** G&A
 ** R&D
 ** Product
 ** Sales
 ** Marketing
 * Tms code: not from TMS
 * Mandatory: no

 * Can edit: owner, arranger and auditor
 * Can see: approver, accountant and administrator
 * Appears: top of the statement (at the header)

 ** 

EN: Private vacation dates
 * Type of FDF: free text
 * Tms code: not from TMS
 * Mandatory: no

 * Can edit: owner, arranger and auditor
 * Can see: approver, accountant and administrator
 * Appears: top of the statement (at the header)

 ** 

EN: start date
 * In the same way as screenshot (procurx-pangea):

 

!image-2023-06-08-16-38-07-891.png!

 

EN: End date
 * In the same way as screenshot (procurx-pangea):

!image-2023-06-08-16-37-58-302.png!

 

These FDFs (start date and end date) should appear for *car rental and hotel receipts only.*

*3.-Export file*
 * Please, add the export file that you can find in the following systems: procurx-jifiti/Bionic
 * Per Diem receipt should apply for Per Diem Amount column.
 * *GL accounts, tax rate keys, etc. will be done by us in EMS.*

*Thank you*

*Julie*

column1: Eberspaecher - missing resource in a .properties file
column27:
Dear colleagues,

this CI is related to https://jira.ifao.net/browse/ITE-1873 

Please can you fix this issue with the information of Martin?
Thank you in advance and best regards,

Annette

Outcome of the ITE:

 
+*Issue as reported:*+

Error while calculating. No PDF generated

+*Labels:*+

SAExp:iConf -> Error is caused by misconfiguration of the system

+*Root Cause:*+

The error is:
{code:java}
Resource not found at: subpageheader.jasper. {code}
meaning this happened during the report generation phase of calculation.

The issue is caused by a missing resource in a .properties file of the eberspaecher configuration (Engie - file based)

There was a change in the past three days:

!image-2023-06-06-16-35-18-251.png|width=787,height=221!

But I think the issue was not introduced here. I checked the files and found that for instance the resource "expense.report.pageHeader.internalOrder" is undefined in properties files:

!image-2023-06-06-16-35-50-310.png|width=1166,height=687!

!image-2023-06-06-16-36-19-528.png|width=734,height=280!

 

+*Solution:*+

Open a CI ticket and ask Codebusters to check the resources used in subpageheader.jrxml file: [https://repository.secure.ifao.net:7443/projects/EXP/repos/engine-configs/browse/CalculationConfiguration/eberspaecher/de/default/20220520-99990101/report/subpageheader.jrxml]

System: lcc-lueckertz-fiege

Location: TESTSTANDORT Fiege Italien

Hello team,

Please, I need the following changes for the VAT: 
Only the tax rates (regular, reduced and reduce_2) must be displayed for the receipts Flight Costs, Hotel accommodation and Rental car in the drop down menu. The rest of the receipts, they only must have 0% without any possibility to be changed.

System text:
The current one is:
Limit of € 25.00 for dinner only, with the exception of lunches with customers and suppliers. Lunch not refunded as the company provides meal vouchers with the exception of lunches with customers and suppliers.
The new one is (it applies for all the languages as you can see in VEGAS):
Limit of € 30.00 for dinner only, with the exception of lunches with customers and suppliers. Lunch not refunded as the company provides meal vouchers with the exception of lunches with customers and suppliers.

Please, I don't know if we can add the validation that if the receipt meals (expense.basereceipt.receipt.reimbursement.meal) is more than 30€, an error appears in Engine. If it is possible, please, implement it with the following error message: According to the Expense policy, the maximum amount is 30€. 
If it is not possible, please, implement the standard validator FixedReceiptReimbursementLimitValidator with 30€ as maximum for this receipt.

Thank you team!

Alejandro
column198:
Server: BALI ; world
System: lcc-lueckertz-fiege
Location: TESTSTANDORT Fiege Italien

column1: DER:set up export
column27:
*Please implement export to sftp and auto export for customer DERPART-selfbooking3*

*Customer requested to have it sent to SFTP AMADEUS SERVER*
 # What data should be exported?

-export file => not required; will be pulled manually by customer from Cytric
 - attachments => not required, if included in reports
 - reports => OK, if receipts included, otherwise also attachments are needed

+Notes:+ If reports do not include attachments (receipts), then we need two folders (Interhyp/reports and Interhyp/attachments), so please implement with this :

in Cytric when you generate PDF report attachments are embedded in the PDF, but not on sftp server, however we have a feature which most probably can solve this [https://confluence.secure.ifao.net/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=308023593#tab-From+other+blocks] and combines report with attachments on sftp server.

 

So to be testesd and if not working we will change to 2 files structure (reports+attachments) as above

 
 # File structure:

         Interhyp/reports
 # IP address of a machine from which the customer will access the files

              80.190.122.240
            212.121.139.240
 # What time of the day and how often should the files be exported automatically? Daily at 22:00 CET
 # Will the automatic set up be at system level or for location? location

So please each location after 1 minute:

                 Location a: schedule at 22:00

                 Location b: schedule at 22:01

                 Location c: schedule at 22:02

And so on,

 
 # Email address where the credentials will be sen:  chailer@interhyp.de          (Christian Hailer)
 # Email where the notifications will be sent: cytric.notification@interhyp.de
 # mail notifications specify successful or failed: failed
 # agreement to test it in a real statement sending a manual export job: ok test location
 # effective: 01.04.2023

Sandra

column1: Endress Hauser - Add customelogic for "SpecialOverNightCase"
column27:
Hello team,

Users should receive one day's per diem instead of two per diems for work of 8 hours or more that straddles the night shift date.
If the "overnight" checkbox is checked, please adjust to apply this customelogic.

{color:#ff0000}*Please deploy it to DE test locations on PROD first. We will deploy it to prod locations after customer test.*

*Cut off date 01 JUN 2023*
*20210101 - 20230601*
*20230601 - 99999999*
{color}

Could you please add  / adjust the  customelogic for "SpecialOverNightCase".

1) DFD on Abesence

!image-2023-05-26-10-25-06-535.png|width=598,height=208!
{code:java}
      <dataFieldDescriptor code="SpecialOvernightCase" type="Text" defaultValue="false" mandatory="false" elementLinkType="net.ifao.vegas.domain.expense.StringLink" elementLinkRole="expense.absence.specialOvernightCase">
        <assignTo>
          <assign type="${CLASS_Absence}">
            <gui>
              <dataFieldGUI labelPosition="LEFT" guiType="CHECK_BOX" tab="Absence.journeyData" />
            </gui>
          </assign>
        </assignTo>
        <nameTranslation>
          <name locale="de_DE">Übernachttätigkeit: Hiermit bestätige ich, dass ich nach 24 Uhr von meiner 1-tägigen Dienstreise zurückgekehrt bin (ohne Übernachtung)</name>
          <name locale="en_US">Working overnight: I hereby confirm that I have returned from my 1-day business trip after midnight (without overnight stay)</name>
        </nameTranslation>
        <descriptionTranslation>
          <name locale="de_DE"Übernachttätigkeit: Hiermit bestätige ich, dass ich nach 24 Uhr von meiner 1-tägigen Dienstreise zurückgekehrt bin (ohne Übernachtung)</name>
          <name locale="en_US">Working overnight: I hereby confirm that I have returned from my 1-day business trip after midnight (without overnight stay)</name>
        </descriptionTranslation>
        <roles>
          <canEdit name="ExpenseStatementOwner" />
          <canEdit name="ExpenseArranger" />
          <canSee name="ExpenseApproverRestricted" />
          <canSee name="ExpenseApproverFinal" />
          <canEdit name="ExpenseAuditor" />
          <canSee name="ExpenseAccountant" />
          <canSee name="ExportProcess" />
          <canSee name="ExpenseManager" />

column1: BCD-AT-LKW - Adapt a custom script (estimation)
column27:
System: BCD-AT-LKW

Hello team,

I would need the following from you:
 * Is the change possible? (YES/NO)
 * How much effort is involved?
 * When it could be done? (PI 8/PI23.3 for sure but I would need a confirmation here)

The customer has the following rule:

When cytric Expense was implemented, a 15 euro tax amount rule was stored for all countries - with except of Austria and Germany. Means that for receipts from Austria and Germany, all tax amounts (even if they are less than 15 euros) are shown on the export files for accounting. 

Now, the customer wants the following:

The request refers to whether the tax amount rule for receipts Germany can be set to EUR 10 - but ONLY for the location WALTER GROUP Service GmbH. In the future, so that only tax amounts over EUR 10 should be shown in the export files for accounting for the WALTER GROUP for receipts from Germany.

 

Thank you team!

Alejandro

System: BCD-AT-LKW
Location: WALTER GROUP Service GmbH

column1: Continental -  Update regEx expression for CostCenter of DFD
column27:
Hello team,

Could you please update the regEx expression for CostCenter of DFD.

Now
<regEx expression="[0-9]\{2,12}|[a-zA-Z]\{2}-[0-9]\{6}-[0-9]\{4}|[0-9]\{3}-[0-9]\{4}" />
After
<regEx expression="[0-9]\{2,12}|[a-zA-Z]\{2}-[0-9]\{6}-[0-9]\{4}|[0-9]\{2,3}-[0-9]\{4}|[A-Za-z]\{4}-[0-9]\{6}-[0-9]\{4}" />


{code:java}
      <dataFieldDescriptor code="CostCenterReceipt" tmsCode="CostCenter" type="Text" mandatory="false" elementLinkType="net.ifao.vegas.domain.expense.StringLink" elementLinkRole="expense.costCenter">
        <assignTo>
          <assign type="${CLASS_Receipt}" displayOrder="1">
            <gui>
              <dataFieldGUI labelPosition="LEFT" guiType="FREE_TEXT" tab="Receipt.generalReceiptData" />
            </gui>
            <validation>
              <from.traveler>
                <constraint>
                  <regEx expression="[0-9]{2,12}|[a-zA-Z]{2}-[0-9]{6}-[0-9]{4}|[0-9]{2,3}-[0-9]{4}|[A-Za-z]{4}-[0-9]{6}-[0-9]{4}" />                 </constraint>
              </from.traveler>
            </validation>
          </assign>
        </assignTo>
        <nameTranslation>
          <name locale="en_US">SG Cost Centre/WBS</name>
          <name locale="en_GB">SG Cost Centre/WBS</name>
          <name locale="fr_FR">SG Cost Centre/WBS</name>
          <name locale="de_DE">SG Cost Centre/WBS</name>
        </nameTranslation>
        <descriptionTranslation>
          <name locale="en_US">SG Cost Centre/WBS</name>
          <name locale="en_GB">SG Cost Centre/WBS</name>
          <name locale="fr_FR">SG Cost Centre/WBS</name>
          <name locale="de_DE">SG Cost Centre/WBS</name>
        </descriptionTranslation>
        <roles>
          <canEdit name="ExpenseStatementOwner" />
          <canEdit name="ExpenseArranger" />
          <canSee name="ExpenseApproverRestricted" />
          <canSee name="ExpenseApproverFinal" />
          <canEdit name="ExpenseAuditor" />
          <canSee name="ExpenseAccountant" />
          <canSee name="ExportProcess" />
          <canSee name="ExpenseManager" />
          <canSee name="ExpenseAdministrator" />
        </roles>
      </dataFieldDescriptor> {code}
 

Best regards,
Yutaka

 * Location / Division: < Rail Cargo Logistics-Austria GmbH >

Date / Time the issue occurred: <28.03.2023 22:18 CET  >

Acting User Information:
 * User Name, 20006369
 * First Name, beck
 * last Name, Dietmar
 * Location / Division: Rail Cargo Logistics-Austria GmbH
 * legal basis: KV Angestellte in Speditionund Logistik Geb.st.1 
 * Acting in Role creator>

+{{The correct calculation is:}}+
{{Day 1: € 4.40}}
{{Day 2: €26.40}}

{{A new trip begins on the 2nd day, but according to the KV, a maximum of 1 daily rate (€ 26.40) is due for each calendar day in Germany, even if the 12-hour travel time is exceeded on the 2nd day.}}

 

+note:+ Please verify with Mircea beforehand

column258:
31/May/23 4:59 PM;mmaciejczyk;Dear [~jtkacz],

I did test both processes (location: Location: Rheinmetall AG Teststandort, Düsseldorf)

If the reimbursement is higher than 2499 (I made for exact 2500) - I used Air fare receipt amount to reimbursement -> it went to approver restricted [1st lvl] -> then straight to auditing (it should go to final approver [2nd lvl]

If the reimbursement is lower than 2500 (I made for exact 2000) - I used Air fare receipt amount to reimbursement -> it went to approver restricted [1st lvl] -> then straight for auditing - there should be no approvals steps at all

 

Could you please recheck? I deeply apologize if I tested this wrongly - but my understanding of that logic is the total amount (if lower or higher than 2500euro) - and then 2 ways of approval flow.

I remain to answer any of your questions.

 

Thank you in advance!

 

Best regards,

Milosz;;;

column1: Endress Hauser - New custom logic for Credit card clearing process
column27:
Hello team.

Customer request the new custome logic for Credit card clearing process.

The custom logic associated with this has already been deployed at the IT location, and this time it's basically the same logic with a few differences. (CI-5163)

IT location
[https://repository.secure.ifao.net:7443/projects/EXP/repos/engine-configs/browse/CalculationConfiguration/ama-ch-eh/it/default/20220401-99990101/customlogic.properties.xml]

Engine custome logic
!image-2023-04-18-09-07-07-759.png!

 

*New custome logic*
*!image-2023-04-18-09-16-34-824.png!*



The TO BE REIMBURSED transaction postings remain untouched

In case that the flag is '{*}{color:#de350b}Paid \{*}by c{*}ompany'{color}{*} in the export we should have:



meaning in the export:

<PaidbyCompany>true</PaidbyCompany>

then

a DEBIT posting as usually done in case of not already paid by company has to be created

a duplicate posting with CREDIT and clearing card account: *{color:#de350b}CCARD{color}* has to be created;

the duplicate posting contains the same data as the DEBIT entry just that it has a different AccountNumber and PostingRecordType is CREDIT. the duplicate posting has to succeed its DEBIT counterpart meaning to be grouped ( Hotel debit +credit 1 after the other if possible)

{*}example{*}:

  <PostingRecord>

        <AccountNumber>HOTUE</AccountNumber>

        <CostUnit/>

        <CostCenter>AAA</CostCenter>

        <Amount>55.00</Amount>

        <NetAmount>55.00</NetAmount>

        <TaxRate>0.00</TaxRate>

        <TaxAmount>0.00</TaxAmount>

        <TaxRateKey>V0</TaxRateKey>

        <PostingKey>40</PostingKey>

        <PostingRecord>Type>DEBIT</PostingRecordType>

        <PostingText>Hotel</PostingText>

        <ElementID>262164</ElementID>

    </PostingRecord>

    <PostingRecord>

        <AccountNumber>CCARD</AccountNumber>

        <CostUnit/>

        <CostCenter>AAA</CostCenter>

        <Amount>55.00</Amount>

        <NetAmount>55.00</NetAmount>

        <TaxRate>0.00</TaxRate>

        <TaxAmount>0.00</TaxAmount>

        <TaxRateKey>V0</TaxRateKey>

        <PostingKey>50</PostingKey>

        <PostingRecordType>CREDIT</PostingRecordType>

        <PostingText>HOTEL</PostingText>

        <ElementID>262164</ElementID>

    </PostingRecord>

Best regards,
Yutaka

Amadeus / ama-ch-eh

column1: Continental: change the cap defined for the receipt type 'Waters'
column27:
Dear Team,

 

Customer is asking to update the receipt type *‘Waters '/ ‘Eaux'.*

It has been defined the cap of 7 euros.

And currently, if the entered amount is higher than 7 euros, the following error message is displayed: 'The limit cap is exceeded. Maximum amount is 7 euros.' --> please, see screenshot in the attachment.

In french version: 'La limite pour cette dépense est dépassée, merci de respecter la limite de 7 euros.'

 

They would like to have as below:

1/ Change the cap defined for this receipt type. Replace 7 euros by 9 euros.

2/ Change the error message with the new value so,

+Future versions:+

*in English version:* 'The limit cap is exceeded. Maximum amount is 9 euros.'

*in French version:* ‘La limite pour cette dépense est dépassée, merci de respecter la limite de 9 euros.’

 

Effective date: *01/05/2023*

Location: *CONTINENTAL France*



Thanks in advance!

Karolina
column198:
AMADEUS : ama-de-continental
CONTINENTAL France

Karolina;;;

column1: Porsche: replace Error message Configuration date from English to German language
column27:
Dear Team,

Customer reported that when the period of time after which user can retrospectively create an expense ststatements exceeded, the corresponding error message is displayed in English instead of German (please, see also in attachment):



error.expense.baseReceipt.wrongDate

error.expense.date.dateBeforeConfigurationAllowedDate


!image-2023-04-13-09-35-33-211.png|width=343,height=156!
!image-2023-04-13-09-38-46-568.png|width=1212,height=130!

The correct text in error message should be always in German as follows:

"Belegdatum ist ungültig
 Das Datum liegt zeitlich vor dem laut Konfiguration erlaubten Datum"

Effective date: 15.04.2023



1/ changes in BALI system

2/ changes in STAGING system

3/ changes in PROD once confirmed by the customer

 

Can I ask you to change this as per request?
Thank you in adavance!

Best Regards

Karolina

column1: VW SEAT - export modification
column27:
Dear colleagues,

please change first on Prod on 

!image-2023-04-12-18-36-15-536.png|width=382,height=70!

and later for all locations.

customer's request for Export:
 * if a user in the expense settlement has uploaded separately 3 different types of tickets and receipts, this is how we should receive them in SAP. And not everything together as this is how we are receiving it now.
 * when that settlement is sent to our SAP finance, all the receipts and invoices must arrive separately for us to be able to differentiate them and to have a traceability of everything that comes to us.

{color:#ff0000}As this description is not very clear, I had a call with Conovum and received a sample file of customer "Spiegel" who has the setup as expected by SEAT.{color}
{color:#ff0000}I added the sample with the export structure as it should be and a sample as it currently is.{color}

The "Attachments"section is missing in the file from SEAT. Should come after the FDF information. See comparison here (attachments at mirror marked in yellow).

!image-2023-04-12-18-17-50-232.png|width=967,height=304!

 

If you need more information please do not hesitate to contact me.

Thank you in advance and best regards,

Annette

current setup in Bitbucket:

[https://repository.secure.ifao.net:7443/projects/VEG/repos/ce-configs/browse/configurations/amademea/ama-es-Seat/configuration_2023_03_24.xml]

column1: Allianz - NEW FDF
column27:
Dear Team,

This change have been done in {*}BALI, Staging and Production{*}.

The *effective date* for BALI and Staging is 01.04.2023

And the *effective date* for Production is on 01.06.2023

Only *Business Trip* Configuration

 

Allianz would like to create a new FDF which has to be set-up in the user profile and in the statement as well.

*+FDF named :+* "Mileage allowance extended"

Answer : YES / NO

 

They also would like that in case user benefits from the increase in the respective expense statement the following sentence have to be added  to the expense reporting and ensure that the X in the wording below will be replaced by the total amount of the 16 Cent per km.

*The mileage allowance has been already updated by me in BALI and Staging.*

Dear Team,

I hope you do well!

Please, could you update the below text which appears in the receipt?

!image-2023-03-28-12-19-36-739.png|width=822,height=380!

!image-2023-03-28-12-19-48-516.png!

Customer use only German language for that text (in both DE and EN versions), so we will use German text for both: EN and DE.

Old text (from screenshot): 

"Alle Belege müssen eine korrekte und vollständige Firmenbezeichnung inkl. Rechtsform als Rechnungsempfänger aufweisen. Einzige Erleichterung: Bei Bons und Quittungen unter 250 € kann auf die Angabe der Firmenbezeichnung komplett verzichtet werden.

Grundsätzlich ist das günstigste Verkehrsmittel unter Einschluss des öffentlichen Nahverkehrs zu nutzen. Die Nutzung eines Taxis ist auf Dienstfahrten zu beschränken, bei denen die Nutzung von ÖPNV nicht zumutbar bzw. zeitlich nicht möglich ist."

must be changed to:

"Alle Belege müssen eine korrekte und vollständige Firmenbezeichnung inkl. Rechtsform als Rechnungsempfänger aufweisen. Einzige Erleichterung: Bei Bons und Quittungen unter 250 € kann auf die Angabe der Firmenbezeichnung komplett verzichtet werden."

(the lower part must be deleted)

 

Thank you in advance!

 

Best regards,

Milosz

+*German:*+ 

„Bei Rechnungen muss darauf geachtet werden, dass diese den gesetzlichen Anforderungen gemäß §§ 14ff UStG entsprechen. Siehe USt-Handbuch (Rechtliche Grundlagen (§§ 14 ff. UStG)) in Allianz Connect.„

Sandra

column1: Deutschlandradio - calculation setting "expense.DE.automaticTMR" true for automatic 3M rule
column27:
Dear colleagues,

with reference to  

https://jira.ifao.net/browse/ITE-1687 and https://jira.ifao.net/browse/CE-4324

please modify the following setting for correct calculation of automatic 3-months-rule:

{color:#de350b}*calculation setting "expense.DE.automaticTMR" needs to be set to true for the automatic three month rule* {color}to take an effect

{color:#de350b}*OR*{color} 

since the customer *{color:#de350b}is still in file-based it's in the calculation.properties file.{color}*

 

Documentation is waiting for update by Andreea Gheorghe, if you double check here for setup:

[https://confluence.secure.ifao.net/display/EXPDLY/Three-month-rule+check+activation] 

If you have technical questions you can contact Marius Hilbich.

Thank you in advance and best regards,

Annette
column198:
Server: vegas.travel
System: deutschlandradio
column257:
29/Mar/23 12:13 PM;mkuchciak;Hello [~skarja],

All settings are correct. The thing is that we agreed on the cut-off date with the customer to set it to 01.01.2023. The statement is from 2022. Hence the logic doesn't work. However, in Vegas the cut-off date was not set, therefore in the UI (PDF report in this case) the users can see 3M Rule applied even though it is not.

We have 2 possible solutions in here:
 # Make cut-off date in Vegas config, to not see 3M Rule before 2023 in the PDF report
 # Adjust logic in previous period like we have in period starting from 01.01.2023

I'd go with 1st option to sustain our agreement with the customer, nevertheless if the customer wants extend the rule for earlier period we can do it.

Please liaise with the customer and let us now about their decision.

Thank you!

 ;;;

Annette

column1: Vaillant -  Adjustment custom logic
column27:
Hello team,

Could you please adjustment the custom logic.
A customer implemented custom logic in CI-7229, but it took half a year to deploy, so a few adjustments are needed. Also, since it is not expanded to the DE locations below, please adjust and expand including these locations.

This logic has to be rolled out for all German locations. Currently, there are some locations not affected (e.g. company codes 0110 / Vaillant Deutschland GmbH & Co. KG and 0113 / Vaillant GmbH export).


Currently, there are the following two check boxes, but we will unify the following check boxes into one. And, If the check box is not checked, an error message will be returned. Please update that message as well.

<Now>
□I hereby confirm that this travel expense statement is not related to a company event, entertainment / hospitality of employees or an incentive.
□I hereby confirm that this travel expense statement is related to at least one of above-mentioned expenses which have already been reported in the scope of reporting process to HR department.

!image-2023-03-14-15-16-30-786.png|width=438,height=513!

<After>
□I hereby confirm, that I've taken into account the guideline on the tax wage treatment of entertainments, events and gifts (Vaillant GroupNet => Apps and tools => HR tools => veranstaltungen__bewirtungen_und_geschenke_dokumentieren).

*New text:*
**

{color:#de350b}*GERMAN*{color}

Hiermit bestätige ich, dass ich die Richtlinie zur lohnsteuerlichen Behandlung von Bewirtungen, Veranstaltungen und Geschenken (Vaillant GroupNet => Apps and Tools => HR-Tools => Veranstaltungen, Bewirtungen und Geschenke dokumentieren) berücksichtigt habe. *

*ENGLISH*

I hereby confirm, that I've taken into account the guideline on the tax wage treatment of entertainments, events and gifts (Vaillant GroupNet => Apps and tools => HR tools => veranstaltungen__bewirtungen_und_geschenke_dokumentieren). *




{*}{*}Errro message:

{color:#de350b}*Error GERMAN:*{color}
Bitte bestätigen Sie, dass Sie die Richtlinie zur lohnsteuerlichen Behandlung von Bewirtungen, Veranstaltungen und Geschenken berücksichtigt haben.

{color:#de350b}*Error ENGLISH:*{color}
Please confirm, that you've taken into account the guideline on the wage tax treatment of entertainments, events and gifts.


Best regards,
Yutaka

31/Mar/23 3:11 PM;msalajan;Hi [~nsanchez] 

To avoid any confusion, let's not talk about "pull", but be more specific:

Today, this customer does not have the export setup towards any sftp server. On which server do they want the export to be provided? On 1A one? In this case :
 * we need to create a new space for them
 * provide them user & PDW & the link to our sftp server
 * they must provide the IP from which they will connect so we whitelist and only accept connections from that IP

If they want the file provided on an SFTP server they own, they must provide the URL+ User+ PWD + whitelist our IP.

You also provide a mail for notifications: which notifications would you like configured on this mail? Export successful/failed?

Thanks for clarifying.;;;

column1: Allianz - Change the approval behaviour
column27:
Dear Team,

 

Allianz would like to change a bit the approval behaviour for the locations DE-Allianz Beratungs- und Vertriebs AG.

 

Today all statements need to be approved and after audited before to be exported for reimbursement.

Allianz would like to remove the approver and auditor process for all statements with amount less or equal to 20€.

 

1. Option

User submits the statement without approver and auditor.

The statement will be automatically approved and paid out.

 

2. Option

User submits the statement without approver and auditor.

The statement will be automatically sent to a group mailbox.

Allianz will implement a robotic KI behind this group mailbox.

Approval will be done by KI.

The statement will be paid out.

 

I assume the first option is easily feasible but not sure for the second option requested.

If this last is not feasible, please could you give me the reason (request from Allianz).

 

Please let me know also how many manday is needed it.

 

Thank you.

Best regards,

Sandra
column198:
Server: amadeus
System: ama-de-allianz
Location: All DE-Allianz Beratungs- und Vertriebs AG
column258: 15/Mar/23 2:10 PM;ssanz;[~djagodzki] , Thanks for your explanation. I will inform Allianz and once they are ready to make the change in their approval behaviour, I will open a new CI. BR, Sandra;;;

Adeus Aktienregister-Ser.

„Bitte teilen Sie den Hotelrechnungsbetrag auf in Hotelübernachtung und Hotelfrühstück. Geben Sie bei einer Hotelübernachtung die Angabe zum Frühstück im Reiseverlauf unter erhaltene Mahlzeiten an."

„Bitte geben Sie die Hotelrechnungsbeträge getrennt, nach den jeweiligen Mehrwertsteuersätzen („MwSt.") laut Beleg, ein.

Hotelübernachtung = 7 % MwSt.

Getränke zum Hotelfrühstück = 7 % MwSt. (Belegart: Bitte Hotelfrühstück verwenden und MwSt. entsprechend anpassen.)"

  

EN:

"Please split the hotel invoice amount into hotel accommodation and hotel breakfast. In case the accommodation includes breakfast, please add this information under received meals in the travel section travel itinerary."

 

NEW:

"Please enter the hotel billing amounts according to the VAT rates listed in your receipts separately.

Hotel accommodation = 7 % VAT

column1: Numiga FEV - Hide FDF for owner of statement
column27:
System: lcc-hagemann-fev

Hello team,

Please, the following FDFs must no be visible for owner/arranger of the statement:
 * Employee Number (Personalnummer)
 * Department (Standort des Reisenden)
 * Internal Account (Interner Account)
 * Manager (Genehmiger)
 * Authorizer Email 1 (Authorizer Email 1)
 * Location of employee (Einsatzort des Reisenden)
 * Division (Siglum) (Abteilung (Siglum))
 * Manager name (Name des Vorgesetzten)
 * Manager employee id (Personalnummer des Vorgesetzten)
 * Manager email address (Emailadresse des Vorgesetzten)

For the rest of the roles will remain as they are today.

Thank you!

Alejandro

column1: allianz:add check box with validator
column27:
*please add :*

*Checkbox "Generalized per diem" also for location ABV KBV analogue ABV AD*

Please insert a checkbox - analogous to Location ABV AD - for the „{*}Generalized per diem“{*} in the header level between the FDF „Expense reference ID“ and the field „Click/Drop to add attachment“.

!image-2023-02-08-14-57-11-373.png!

 

Effects if the KBV activates the checkbox: No payment of the statutory per diem allowance even if the KBV was on business for more than 8 hours.

 

+Example:+
 # Without {*}Generalized per diem (Status quo){*}:

 

KBV is on business for 7 hours

à no payment of a per diem allowance, if the KBV has received a meal from his employer, the non-monetary remuneration values are displayed to him on the expense report and he must pay tax on these values.

 

KBV is on the road on official business for more than 8 hours

à payment of a per diem allowance of EUR 14 or EUR 28, if the KBV has received a meal from his employer, his per diem allowances are reduced accordingly.

!image-2023-02-08-14-57-44-037.png!
 # With *Generalized per diem*

 

KBV is on business for 7 hours

à no payment of a per diem allowance, if the KBV has received a meal from his employer, the non-monetary remuneration values are displayed to him on the expense report and he must pay tax on these values.

 

KBV is on the road on official business for more than 8 hours

à no payment of a per diem allowance, if the KBV has received a meal from his employer, the non-monetary remuneration values are displayed to him on the expense report and he must pay tax on these values.

!image-2023-02-08-14-58-06-034.png!

 

 

 

 

!image-2023-02-08-14-58-28-249.png!

 

 

!image-2023-02-08-14-58-42-671.png!

column1: Endress Hauser - Update system text
column27:
Hello team,

Could you please update the system text,

Please remove as below,
{code:java}
     <dataFieldDescriptor type="SystemText" code="expenseStatement.receipts.general.topOfTab">
      <nameTranslation>
        <name locale="en_US">System Text: Expense Statement/Receipts</name>
        <name locale="de_DE">System Text: Expense Statement/Receipts</name>
        <name locale="fr_FR">System Text: Expense Statement/Receipts</name>
      </nameTranslation>
      <assignTo>
        <assign type="${CLASS_Section}" />
      </assignTo>
      <values>
        <item value="expenseStatement.receipts.general.topOfTab">
          <name locale="en_US">To declare private expenses which have been accidentally paid with business credit card, proceed as follows: <br/>
            1.        Create a new receipt with the column ‘to be reimbursed’ and the receipt type “Private expenses company credit card” <br/>
            2.        Insert the private used amount as negative value. <br/>
            3.        In the credit card feed item, set the amount to the value which affects the company (at full private use the amount would be 0.00 CHF)</name>
          <name locale="de_DE">Um versehentliche Privatausgaben mit der Firmenkreditkarte zu deklarieren, gehen Sie wie folgt vor.  <br/>
            1.        Legen Sie einen neuen Beleg mit der Rubrik „zu erstatten“ und der Belegart „Privatausgabe Firmenkreditkarte“ an <br/>
            2.        Geben Sie den privat bezogenen Betrag als negativen Betrag ein. <br/>
            3.        Ändern Sie den Betrag in der Belegzeile aus dem Kreditkartenfeed auf die Höhe des Aufwands welcher die Firma betrifft (bei vollem Privatbezug somit auf 0.00 CHF)</name>
          <name locale="fr_FR">Pour déclarer des frais privés qui ont été payés par erreur avec la carte de crédit business, suivez les informations suivantes: <br/>
            1.        Créez un nouveau justificatif avec la colonne « à rembourser » et le type de justificatif « Carte de crédit de l'entreprise de dépenses privées ».  <br/>
            2.        Insérez le montant utilisé privé comme valeur négative. <br/>
            3.        Dans le poste d'alimentation de la carte de crédit, mettez le montant à la valeur qui affecte l'entreprise (en cas d'utilisation privée complète, le montant serait de 0,00 CHF).</name>
        </item>
      </values>
      <roles>
        <canSee name="ExpenseStatementOwner" />
        <canSee name="ExpenseArranger" />
        <canSee name="ExpenseApproverRestricted" />
        <canSee name="ExpenseApproverFinal" />
        <canSee name="ExpenseAuditor" />
        <canSee name="ExpenseAccountant" />
        <canSee name="ExportProcess" />
        <canSee name="ExpenseManager" />
        <canSee name="ExpenseAdministrator" />
        <canSee name="ExpenseAdministratorRestricted" />
      </roles>
    </dataFieldDescriptor> {code}

Best regards,
Yutaka

tbtrans01 and tbtrans02


 * 2 folders exist

configured for teambank system on world
access with user tbtrans02 as expected by the customer yes / no ?

configured, but not clear for which system
access credentials for user tbtrans01 are present on customer's side ,so it seems that it was configured for teambank system on staging? 


 * is it possible to use it for staging system for teambank as expected by the customer?


 * if yes: what has to be changed on our side and is any action on customer side needed?

Annette

access with user tbtrans02 as expected by the customer yes / no ?

 *

configured, but not clear for which system
access credentials for user tbtrans01 are present on customer's side ,so it seems that it was configured for teambank system on staging? 

Answer 2. tbtrans01 is configured but not in use and customer has credentials to it so in my opinion we can use it as test path on staging.
 * is it possible to use it for staging system for teambank as expected by the customer?

Answer 3. I think it is if this question is in regards with tbtrans01.
 * if yes: what has to be changed on our side and is any action on customer side needed?

Answer 4. If customer has credentials to tbtrans01, the only thinh we have to do is changing the sftp path in vegas config
 * you write "only folder "belege" was changed in 2023": do we have a CI for this or why was it changed and by whom?

column1: Porsche - Add "expense.DE.absence.apply24hRule"
column27:
Hello team,

{color:#de350b}*Please implement first only on Porsche Staging System:*{color}
{color:#de350b}*https://staging.cytric.net/env-a/ibe/?system=Porsche-Test*{color}

Could you add "expense.DE.absence.apply24hRule" on calculation.properties.

expense.DE.absence.apply24hRule=true

Customer request:

+Currently:+ For days marked in yellow (user filled in 00:00-24:00) the user calculates the reduced per diem rate (see red marked amount)

{+}Required change{+}: If a user filled in an absence 00:00-24:00 on day of arrival/departure the system should calculate the +full+ per diem (in example 40,00 EUR)

Only if the user filled in an absence between 00:00 – 23:59 the reduced per diem should apply

!image-2023-01-25-17-19-57-731.png|width=753,height=264!

!image-2023-01-25-17-20-06-893.png!

Best regards,
Yutaka

Hello team,

Please, add the following information in the system:

*1.- Receipts* (just English, no other language applies)
|*Flight expenses*|expense.basereceipt.receipt.ticket.flight |(/)|
|{*}Accommodation{*}{*}{{*}}|expense.basereceipt.receipt.hotel|(/)|
|*Fuel*|expense.basereceipt.receipt.fuel|(/)|
|*Rental car*|expense.basereceipt.receipt.car.rental|(/)|
|*Ground transportation*|expense.basereceipt.receipt.ticket.local|(/)|
|*Trains*|expense.basereceipt.receipt.ticket.mainline|(/)|
|*Uber*|expense.basereceipt.receipt.uber|(/)|
|*Tolls*|expense.basereceipt.receipt.car.toll|(/)|
|*Taxi*|expense.basereceipt.receipt.car.taxi|(/)|
|*Meals and entertainment*|expense.basereceipt.receipt.meals|(/)|
|*Business meals with clients (restricted)*|expense.basereceipt.receipt.entertainment|(/)|
|*Advertising*|expense.basereceipt.receipt.advertising|(/)|
|*Equipment*|expense.basereceipt.receipt.equipment|(/)|
|*Tools*|expense.basereceipt.receipt.tools|(/)|
|*Office Supplies*|expense.basereceipt.receipt.office|(/)|
|*Home Office – phone & Wi-Fi*|expense.basereceipt.receipt.home|(/)|

*Business meals with clients (restricted) -* This receipt has business entertainment behavior

+Default tax rate for Israel for all the receipts: none+

+Default tax rate for any country for all the receipts: none+

*2.-Hide sections*

Please, hide the following features in the itinerary section (meal deductions, accommodation and mileage).

Please, hide cash advance.

*3.-Free Data Fields*

EN: trip purpose
 * Type of FDF: list
 * tms code: trip purpose
 * Mandatory: no
 * The information comes: from booking
 * Can edit: owner, arranger and auditor
 * Can see: approver, accountant and administrator
 * Appears: top of the statement (at the header)

EN: start date
 * In the same way as screenshot (procurx-pangea):

!image-2022-11-08-18-06-59-060.png|width=906,height=390!

EN: End date
 * In the same way as screenshot (procurx-pangea):

!image-2022-11-08-18-08-09-817.png|width=899,height=413!

*GL accounts, tax rate keys, etc. will be done by me in EMS.*

Thank you!

            <name locale="en_US">HUGO BOSS is required by tax law to conduct regular internal audits. Due to this obligation, you must carefully store your original receipts for up to three months after reimbursement of the travel expense statement. ravel Management must be able to request original receipts from all incoming travel expense statements on a random basis in order to check the receipts for authenticity and thus comply with tax digitization requirements. Sending the original receipts to Travel Management is therefore only necessary upon explicit request.</name>

Sending the original receipts to Travel Management is therefore only necessary upon explicit request.</name>
            <name locale="de_DE">HUGO BOSS ist steuerrechtlich verpflichtet regelmäßige interne Auditprüfungen durchzuführen. Aufgrund dieser Verpflichtung musst Du Deine Originalbelege bis drei Monate nach Erstattung Deiner. Reisekostenabrechnung sorgfältig aufbewahren. Das Travel Management muss stichprobenartig Originalbelege aus allen eingehenden Reisekostenabrechnungen anfordern können, um die Belege auf Echtheit zu überprüfen und um somit die steuerlichen Digitalisierungsvorgaben einzuhalten. Ein Versand der Originalbelege an das Travel Management ist daher nur nach expliziter Bitte notwendig.</name>

column1: Numiga GBO - Create new location
column27:
System: gbo

column257:
05/Jan/23 3:26 PM;agheorghe;Hi [~nsanchez] custom logic for this request has been rejected as this is not a requirement meeting the bigger client community 

There is a meal validator that can help here meaning that if we put the start day to be at 13:00 for example and the itinerary starts before 13:00 and breakfast is deducted  then the user will get an error and be blocked 

however if the itinerary is after 13:00 the user will be able to deduct breakfast so to me this is partially meeting the customer needs

They should instruct the users to deduct/not deduct when applicable as all customers do and for the approver/auditor check if the behavior is correct

If not clear, let me know either via Teams or by making sure to switch back to the correct label as otherwise I will not see ur comment/ticket

Thanks

Andreea;;;
column258:
11/Jan/23 3:00 PM;msalajan;Hi [~nsanchez] 

A quick comment from my side about the end time there:

!image-2023-01-11-14-59-48-755.png!

This means, the trip ended on the 20th at midnight exactly. So, on the 21st there were zero minutes of travel, which is why no meals are displayed.

Unfortunately, meals are displayed per day, either all or none. We cannot display only some of the meals. If there is at least 1 minute of travel on a given day, all meals are displayed.;;;

column1: Hugo Boss - Add new FDF called "Destination"
column27:
Dear Team,

Hugo Boss ask to add a mandatory FDF called "destination" in the statements and this information must be available in the E021.

 

As you can see in the screen shot below, they sent two proposal and I assume that the second one is the most easy to implement:

 

!image-2022-12-22-14-15-22-201.png|width=388,height=390!

 

Thank you.

Best regards,

Sandra
column198:
Server: Amadeus
System: ama-de-hugoboss
column257:
10/Jan/23 10:20 AM;mstaszek;Hello [~ssanz] :)

First proposal is not possible in our product.

Second proposal is possible but we need more information:
 * What kind of field we should implement for "multiple destinations" ?
 * Please clarify what destinations should be available in the field. (should be list in vegas configuration, csv file upload, free text)

Thank you!;;;
column258: 12/Jan/23 11:05 AM;ssanz;Question ask to the customer. I'm coming back to you as soon as I have feedback. BR, Sandra;;;
column260:
23/Jan/23 5:26 PM;mstaszek;Hello [~wenner]  :)

I think what Sandra meant in point *2* was -> Add FDF in TMS and add values (country names) in *CSV file,* this way customer has all control over country available in list both travel / expense.
This will be transferred to expense as a list of countries to select from (dropdown) - thanks to "from.fixed.list" tag in configuration.

And "tick" I think is the wrong word used there - imply check-boxes and customer may think multiple choice FDF is possible - it's not :(  
I would you SELECT from list (only one value can be selected)

so the difference between 1st and 2nd option is *(1st)* list in vegas configuration maintained by us and *(2nd)* list in TMS in csv file maintained by customer.

This part clarify my question -> _Please clarify what destinations should be available in the field. (should be list in vegas configuration, csv file upload, free text)_
I am still missing answer to -> What kind of field we should implement for "multiple destinations" ?

as they proposed:

!image-2023-01-23-17-04-20-254.png!


so the option is free text like Sandra proposed in point 3 but she put it as 3rd choice to fist FDF? - I think there was some misunderstanding there

As I understood from their proposal they want to have 2 FDF:

- First called "Destination" -> here we implement point 1 or 2 from Sandra proposals
- Second called "Multiple Destination" -> here point 3. from Sandra proposal (value should be available in E021) *OR* we can have checkbox so true/ false value and they put countries in expense statement description field.

If you need any more clarification please let me know.

Thank you!;;;
column261:
02/Feb/23 3:09 PM;nsanchezruiz;To Sandra SANZ in null role in CI-10232386

 

[~mbucko]  

1-fdf per list (this will be like a list of countries to be selected from a drop-down menu)
a- we would like the list to come from our csv in TMS.

fdf name:destination

will be in pdf?no

will be in export? yes
who can edit? all
source? :none/created in TMS solely for expenses
mandatory: yes

e021:yes

---------

column1: Allianz - Text in the Expense reminder email (related with CI-5816 and CI-6193)
column27:
Dear Team,

This CI is related to CI-5816 and CI-6193.

Allianz asks to add a text at the expense reminder emails (Notification for unsettled trips) but only for all German Locations.

I advise Allianz that the text can only add at the end of the email and it's okay for them.

 The text is the following:

German:

Seit dem 01.01.2020 sind der Travel und Expense Organizer im Sinne einer „End-to-End-Lösung" technisch miteinander verbunden. Somit werden nach der Buchung einer Dienstreise automatisch die vorhandenen Daten aus der Reisebuchung (z.B.: Hotelübernachtungen, Bahnfahrten, Flüge etc.) in das Reisekostenabrechnungstool übertragen.

Diese Buchungen sind dann für Sie im Abrechnungstool jeweils unter dem Reiter Kostenabrechnungen als „Meine Kostenabrechnungen" oder auch als „Kostenabrechnungen für Dritte" in der Arrangerrolle als „nicht zugewiesene Ausgaben" ersichtlich.

„

Dabei müssen Sie zunächst den Beleg anhaken und anschließend auf „Kostenabrechnung erstellen" klicken.  Danach sind die Belege der Kostenabrechnung zugeordnet.

Sollten Sie bereits Ihre Reisekostenabrechnung ohne diese Belege angelegt haben, müssen Sie diese nachträglich einreichen. Hierzu erstellen Sie bitte eine neue Reisekostenabrechnung mit den Belegen unter „nicht zugewiesene Ausgaben". In dieser tragen Sie bitte im Feld „Referenz Expense ID" die Reisenummer der ersten Reise ein. Sie müssen damit auch kein erneuten Reiseverlauf eintragen.

 

English:

Since 01.01.2020 the Travel and Expense Organizer are technically connected with each other for the purpose of an "End-to-End-Solution". This means, that after booking a business trip  all data from the Travel Organizer (e. g. overnight stay at a hotel, train journeys, flights etc.) will be automatically transferred to the Expense Organizer.

Those bookings are then available in the Expense Organizer under the tab called „My Expense Statements" or also under „Expense Statements" in the arranger role as „ unassigned expenses".

"

Thereby you have first to select the respective receipt and click the button „Create expense statement". Subsequently the receipts are assigned to the expense statement.

In case you already have created your expense statement without those receipts, you have to submit those ones retrospectively. Concerning this please create a new expense statement with the receipts listed under „unassigned expenses". Then please enter your trip number from the first journey in the field „reference expense ID". So you don´t have to enter the itinerary once again.

 

Thank you.

Best regards,

Sandra

column1: heidelbergcement - Incorect comnpany coden on Export file
column27:
Hello team,

In the export file, the leading zeros are sometimes eliminated from the FDF company code. Company code "0010" is in the user profile. "10" was supplied in the export file. 

Sample ES: 10331593 
<Statement>
Copmany code: 0010
!image-2022-12-19-14-37-31-051.png|width=432,height=220!

 !Export Journal summary file.png|thumbnail! 

Copy the Export Journal logic used in German and UK entities in staging system to all locations in production system. Please import the changes in waves and validate the correctness of the process after each update. The waves should be processed in the following order:

1. DE location DE-Allianz Beratungs- und Vertriebs AG AD
2. all (3) GB locations together
3. all (2) FR locations together
4. all (10) IN locations together
5. 1 ES and 1 AU locations that share the same Export setup could be updated together

column27:
Dear Team,

Please could you change in system text the following message for all DE locations including ABV AD:

 

+DE:+

+Current message:+

„Bitte teilen Sie den Hotelrechnungsbetrag auf in Hotelübernachtung und Hotelfrühstück. Geben Sie bei einer Hotelübernachtung die Angabe zum Frühstück im Reiseverlauf unter erhaltene Mahlzeiten an."

 

+NEW:+

„Bitte geben Sie die Hotelrechnungsbeträge getrennt, nach den jeweiligen Mehrwertsteuersätzen („MwSt.") laut Beleg, ein.

Hotelübernachtung = 7 % MwSt.

Hotelfrühstück = 19 % MwSt.

Getränke zum Hotelfrühstück = 7 % MwSt. (Belegart: Bitte Hotelfrühstück verwenden und MwSt. entsprechend anpassen.)"

 

 

+EN:+

+Current message:+

"Please split the hotel invoice amount into hotel accommodation and hotel breakfast. In case the accommodation includes breakfast, please add this information under received meals in the travel section travel itinerary."

 

+NEW:+

"Please enter the hotel billing amounts according to the VAT rates listed in your receipts separately.

Hotel accommodation = 7 % VAT

Hotel breakfast = 19 % VAT

Beverages of hotel breakfast = 7 % VAT (receipt type: Please use hotel breakfast and adjust the VAT rate)"

 

Thank you.

Best regards,

Sandra

03/Jan/23 2:27 PM;mkuchciak;Hello [~ssanz],

I reverted all changes in locations ABV/KBV. System texts for these locations should be the same as previously.

Please note that mentioned by you current messages are present only in system texts on system level, this means only locations without specified message for Hotel Receipt will be updated. I saw that in most of DE locations for this receipt type we have set translations as follow:
*DE:*
_Wenn die Hotelrechnung bereits von der Firma bezahlt wurde, brauchen Sie den Hotelrechnungsbetrag nicht nach Übernachtung und Frühstück zu unterteilen. Geben Sie alles unter Übernachtung an. Bitte laden Sie die entsprechende Check-out Email/Delivery Note hoch. Falls Sie selbst die Übernachtung verauslagt haben, teilen Sie den Hotelrechnungsbetrag auf in Hotelübernachtungen und Hotelfrühstück. Die entsprechende Hotelrechnung muss zwingend in Ihre Reisekostenabrechnung hochgeladen werden. Geben Sie in jedem Fall bei einer Hotelübernachtung die Angabe zum Frühstück im Reiseverlauf unter erhaltenen Mahlzeiten an._
*EN:*
_If the hotel bill has already been paid by the company, you do not need to split the hotel bill amount into hotel accommodation and breakfast. Enter everything as hotel accommodation. Please attach the Check-out Email / Delivery Note to your travel expense report. If you have paid directly the hotel invoice, please split the hotel invoice amount into hotel accommodation and breakfast. The corresponding hotel invoice must be uploaded to your travel expense report. In case the accommodation includes breakfast, please add this information under received meals in the travel section travel itinerary._

Therefore please kindly confirm if ALL DE locations should be updated, including locations with translations above?

In addition, please note that AZ TECH is French locations, and according what I've checked in configs no text should be dispalyed for Hotel receipt in this location.

Thank you in advance for you clarification. You can contact me directly if you need further explanations. :);;;

column1: Allianz - Change the mileage calculation
column27:
Dear Team,

For configuration Double budgeting, today the mileage calculation is as following:

 The first 20km is paid 0,30€ and the next km 0,38€

 

In the case below the first line the amount is (20*0,30)+(95*0,38)=42,10€

And the second one 115+0,38 =43,70€

 

Today Alliaz asks to change this way to calculate and would like that each trip even in the same statement is calculates separately. Is it possible ?

 

If yes, please make the change.

 

Thank you.

Best regards,

Sandra

Customer need to change the configuration for private stay in all german entities using Cytric. This rate must be limited to 3 days (20 euros/day). Hello team,

The customer wants to add an additional file in the current export file to take into account the income tax relevant (wage postings). For example, hey pay more daily allowances in Germany up to 50% per day. 

The current export must not be modified.

The additional one is a txt where the structure is specified in the following document: *Schnittstelle_Schnittstellenbeschreibung_Bruttolohnimport* . The original one is in German but I provide the translation in English (thanks to a translator). It is also a txt. file

Besides, I have an example how the new export should be for a test statement that I did. The test statement is *359483 Testing whole sections(1)* with the current export *48107-trav_17112022.* It should have in addition the new file which would be {*}FinalBeispiel_Import (1){*}.

I hope it is clear. Please, ping me if there is some doubt.

Best regards,

Alejandro

column27:
Hello team,

Could you please Add new receipt and limit validation.



<Receipt name>
Personal meal in trip - canada domestic

<limit validator>
Limit : 123CAD

<Error message>
Personal meal in trip - canada domestic (breakfast/lunch/dinner/snacks/Hotel Meals) for the day cannot exceed amount for 123CAD.

CA - Amadeus Canada
CA - TravelClick Canada

Best regards,
Yutaka

Location: 
CA - Amadeus Canada
CA - TravelClick Canada
column257:
08/Dec/22 4:09 PM;mkuchciak;+Business Need: customer wants a cap validator for new receipt with custom error message.+


This can be solved with standard validator FixedReceiptReimbursementLimitValidator. Nonetheless, no error message will pop up, likewise the amount will be simply limited to the number indicated in the validator parameter.;;;
column258:
13/Dec/22 4:27 PM;mkuchciak;Hi [~yutaka] san,

We're not allowed to write new custom logic for the customer.

However we can use standard validator {*}FixedReceiptReimbursementLimitValidator{*}. When the validator is used there in {+}no error message{+}. When the user is putting in the receipt an amount higher than 123 CAD then in Reimbursement summary only 123 CAD will be calculated.
E.g. _Personal meal in trip - canada domestic_ = 300 CAD => _Reimbursement_ = 123 CAD without any error messages.

Please confirm with the customer if this solution can be implemented?

Thank you.;;;
column259:
15/Dec/22 8:55 AM;yutaka.yasumi;[~mkuchciak] 
Hello Maciej san,
Can this limit validator be handled by subactor?

!image-2022-12-15-16-55-05-377.png!;;;
column260:
15/Dec/22 9:30 AM;mkuchciak;Hi [~yutaka] san,

Generally yes, but I have some concerns about recalculating to USD. Nothing in the documentation is mentioned about setting a cap in particular currency. However for each country a separate subactor can be created and this could solve the issue, but then we would need to have a cap in each respective currency.;;;
column261:
16/Dec/22 7:55 AM;yutaka.yasumi;[~mkuchciak] 
Hello Maciej san,
Thank you for your update.
In this case, we can set only one currency, the Canadian dollar (CAD), because we set the upper limit of personal meals used in the country by employees located in Canada.
Isn't this addition a hassle?
Since the limit for overseas business trips is also handled by the subactor, it is desirable that this additional receipt validator is also processed by the subactor if possible.;;;
column263: 05/Apr/23 6:54 AM;yutaka.yasumi;No feedback from customer. Auto closed the OVCX case;;;

column1: deutschlandradio:estimation EF for implementing 3 month rule
column27:
please provide EF required for implementing the 3 month automatic rule:

Set suppress statutory when three month of absence to the same place is reached: 
This needs to be always done, meaning the traveler is not legible to per-diems any more

 

note: client has these specifications:

1. as soon as the traveller is within the three-month period, the per diem for meals shall be capped, i.e. no more additional meal expenses shall be paid to the traveller.
2) Within the three-month period, meals arranged or paid for by Deutschlandradio are to be recognized as remuneration in kind and no longer subject to the statutory meal allowance reductions (20/40/40).

(the non-monetary remuneration values are not to be reduced from the reimbursement amount of the traveler,  but the full reimbursement amount is to be paid to the traveler and the non-monetary remuneration values are to be transfer  with the wage type "3500 Reisekosten geldw. Vort. in the export to be taxed in our HR system )

3. the non-monetary remuneration values should not be reduced from the reimbursement amount of the traveller, but the full reimbursement amount should be paid to the traveller and the non-monetary remuneration values should be  transferred with the wage type "3500 Reisekosten geldw. Vort. in the export, in order to then pay tax on them in our HR
 system.

 

thank you
column198:
system: 	deutschlandradio
server: mega
locations: Deutschlandradio, Test Standort

20/Dec/22 12:09 PM;mkuchciak;+Business Need: customer wants to suppress 3M Rule and all meals deductions within three-months rule should be transferred to wage type {*}3500 Reisekosten geldw. Vort.{*}.+

This cannot be done by standard subactors. A short custom script has to be written to generate new posting record for all meals within 3M Rule to new wage type {_}3500 Reisekosten geldw. Vort.{_}.;;;
